Privacy Policy

EMI-FT LTD operates ixquant.com website (the “Site”, the “Platform”). The current page has the purpose of informing the Users about our policies regarding the collection and usage of the Personal Information we receive from the Users of the Site. When setting up an account on iXQUANT platform the Users are asked to provide some personal data. We do not collect more information than it is required to effectively manage User’s account, billing and invoicing processes as well as communicating with the User.

Personal information being collected:

We or third parties which are acting on our behalf may collect your personal information in the scope of providing you the web service you are subscribed to. This personal information includes your:

Name Email address Phone number Country of residence

Additionally, for the business customers, to be able to prepare the invoice, we will ask you to provide the following information related to your business (Company):

Company name Company address VAT number
How we use your Personal Information:

The Personal Information collected through iXQUANT website will be used for the following purposes:

User’s account management and administration Communication with the user Billing and invoicing process We may use your email address to send you newsletters, educational publications as well as other marketing or promotional materials. Upon User’s request we will remove his email address from our mailing distribution list. In addition, we may use third party services such as Google Analytics to better understand Users’ behaviour on our platform.

The Personal Information will be stored in the EMI-FT LTD database. EMI-FT LTD does not sell or share Users’ information with the other parties.

While we do all the efforts to keep the data safe and secure, EMI-FT LTD will not assume the responsibility for eventual leakage of information due to the reasons beyond the control of EMI-FT LTD.

Changes to the Privacy Policy:

EMI-FT LTD reserves the right to modify the current Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice. The last update date will be indicated at the bottom of the current page.

Last modified: 20th of September 2020
